Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: கொடுத்தலும் இன்சொலும் ஆற்றின் அடுக்கிய சுற்றத்தால் சுற்றப் படும்.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: He will be surrounded by numerous relatives who manifests generosity and affability.

Layered_Composition.Foreground: A person is shown performing two actions. With one hand, they are giving a gift ('கொடுத்தல்'). From their mouth, gentle, kind words are flowing, visualized as soft, glowing butterflies ('இன்சொல்').
Layered_Composition.Midground: Attracted by both the gifts and the kind words, relatives and friends ('சுற்றம்') from all around are shown joyfully gathering around the person, forming a dense, supportive circle.
Layered_Composition.Background: The circle of relatives grows larger and larger, layer upon layer ('அடுக்கிய சுற்றத்தால்'), creating a scene of immense love and community.

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: A person who practices both generous giving and kind speech will naturally attract and be surrounded by a multitude of kinsmen.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The butterflies of kind words and the act of giving are the two causes. The resulting effect is the ever-growing circle of loving relatives.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: A warm, magical light illuminates the scene. The glowing butterflies add a touch of enchantment. The colors are bright, cheerful, and inviting.

Technical_Cues.Camera: A slightly high-angle shot that shows the central person and the growing circle of people being drawn to them.
Technical_Cues.Resolution: 8K, with beautiful particle effects for the butterfly-words.
Technical_Cues.Lighting: Soft, radiant lighting that creates a welcoming atmosphere.

Cultural_Anchors: Being surrounded by numerous kin ('அடுக்கிய சுற்றத்தால்')

Negative_Prompt: person being cruel or silent, people leaving, dark scene, text artifacts, moths instead of butterflies.

Hyperparameters.seed: Explore variations for the butterfly-words effect.
